title: It Took Less Than a Quarter for NFL Fans to Be Sick of AI Ads During Super Bowl LX
description: There were many AI ads early on during the Super Bowl LX broadcast, and it didn’t take long for NFL fans to be sick of them.

title: Worried AI means you won’t get a job when you graduate? Here’s what the research says
